price: 64. Milik-Nyalah apa yang ada di langit dan apa yang ada di bumi. Dan Allah benar-benar Mahakaya, Maha terpuji.
arabic: لَّهُۥ مَا فِي ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَمَا فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِۚ وَإِنَّ ٱللَّهَ لَهُوَ ٱلۡغَنِيُّ ٱلۡحَمِيدُ

version.title: Indonesian Translation - Sabeq Company
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by Sabeq Company, printed in 2016. corrected by Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: lahu mā fī al-samāwāti wamā fī al-arḍi wa-inna al-laha lahuwa al-ghaniyu al-ḥamīdu
